messages.subject: ARGH gathering
messages.msgSnippet: Just a quick reminder that the twice-yearly ARGH gathering will be taking place next weekend, March 14th-16th up at Roan Mountain State Park in TN. Activities
messages.messageBody:
Just a quick reminder that the twice-yearly ARGH gathering will be taking place next weekend, March 14th-16th up at Roan Mountain State Park in TN. Activities and planning are taking place at the list: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AutodidacticRadicalGatheringofHomeschoolers/

As always, folks not staying overnight at the cabins are welcome to come hang out during the day for free! This is an event put on by unschoolers, so it's very family friendly, free-flowing and fun. (whew...is that enough f-words?) lol.

Anyway, just wanted to remind everyone. We'd love to see some of you there!

Ren
radicalunschooling.blogpot.com
